FuncDef: This command configures the Relay Agent Information Option (Option 82) processing.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to overwrite any existing Option 82 field. In the upstream direction (from the user), the Option 82 field from the router is inserted in the packet. In the downstream direction (toward the user) the Option 82 field is stripped (in accordance with RFC 3046).
Specifies to drop the DHCP packet if an Option 82 field is present, and a counter is incremented.

Specifies to keep existing information in the packet and the router does not add any additional information. In the downstream direction the Option 82 field is not stripped and is forwarded towards the client.

ExtraInfo: Default: The default is to keep the existing information intact.
